Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.pages

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.pages.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
Controller class for managing admin-related pages.
